Ngo&agrave;i ra kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n c&ograve;n cung c\u1ea5p nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 \u0103n s&aacute;ng, \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c, h\u1ed3 b\u01a1 ngo&agrave;i tr\u1eddi, ph&ograve;ng t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c ....
